attributes.action: promote, urgently and actively, the commissioning of marine generated energy schemes, with pumped storage facilities where appropriate, in the Severn Estuary and at other suitable locations in the United KIngdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a recent meeting of the South Wales Association of the Institution of Civil Engineers (SWA ICE) Retired Engineers Group (REG) about climate change, and the possible causes thereof, the members resolved to petition the PM on the following:
nuclear generation, pumped storage, tidal power and energy saving.
This is the third petition and was supported by 100% of those present.
